text: Hello. How I can start new jenkins build without making new commit/push?
open the last build from gerrit, login jenkins and push retrigger (left side)
gennady.laventman: to retrigger a verify leave a comment in gerrit of 'recheck' to remerge (which rebuilds the head) and leave a comment of 'remerge'
hgabor: most folks don't, and won't, have access to using the jenkins UI for triggering builds
<@U0UHG4VP1>: pls see my posts above on 8/19
most important is the 2+2 policy that isn’t currently being enforced
would like to start enforcing that

OK. I will start a thread on repo-discuss as it isn’t clear to me how to only add +2 to the score. I found a sample for allowing 1+1 to equal 2, and when I set 2 to 4, it works - but it also allows any sum of scores to equal 4 (1+1+2)
